name: oFormsBeanShell
short_description:
oFormsBeanShell is an Oracle Forms pluggable Java Component (PJC) with gives access to the BeanShell interpreter api from an Oracle forms application. 

This is useful to integrate java components with Oracle Forms in a quick way without having to build a personalized PJC for each component to integrate, we only need to call it through the BeanShell api as we would do from a normal Java program.

PJC are also difficult to debug but with oFormsBeanShell this is very simple as we only need to enable the tracing in oFormsBeanShell and take the BeanShell sentences from the java console window to a normal java program to debug them in a standard IDE like Eclipse.
